mapper.sql: select manager_no, manager_name, manager_id, manager_pw, manager_phone, manager_post1, manager_post2, manager_addr1, manager_addr2, manager_branch from t_manager
mapper.select: select NVL(count(*), 0) from t_manager where manager_addr2 like '%' || #{branch} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into t_manager(manager_no, manager_name, manager_id, manager_pw, manager_phone, manager_post1, manager_post2, manager_addr1, manager_addr2, manager_branch) values(seq_t_user_no.nextval, #{name}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{phone}, #{post1}, #{post2}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{branch})
mapper.select: select NVL(count(*), 0) from t_manager where manager_id = #{id} and manager_pw = #{pw}
select NVL(count(*), 0) from t_manager where manager_name = #{name} and manager_id = #{id}
select manager_id, manager_name from t_manager where manager_name = #{name} and manager_id = #{id}
